articles.title: France braces for record temperatures as wildfires rage across Europe - The Guardian
articles.description: Thousands evacuated as above 40C forecast for some French regions on Monday and more lives lost in soaring heat in Spain
articles.content:
France was bracing on Monday for the peak of the heatwave gripping the country, with crushing temperatures expected from the Mediterranean, as wildfires continued to rage across Europe.

articles.title: Thousands evacuated as wildfires rage out of control in Spain and France - Independent.ie
